snippet: WOTMAN--Anita Freud, on April 12, 2016. Beloved wife of Robert for 66 years. Loving mother of David and Laurie, Daniel and Rebecca, and Paul. Cherished grandmother of Jason, Carly, Andrew, Michael, and Sophia. Adored sister of Philip and Kathleen Freud. Devoted psychoanalyst for 35 years. Services 11am Thursday at Riverside Nassau North Chapels, 55 North Station Plaza, Great Neck, NY. 1/3
lead_paragraph: WOTMAN--Anita Freud, on April 12, 2016. Beloved wife of Robert for 66 years. Loving mother of David and Laurie, Daniel and Rebecca, and Paul. Cherished grandmother of Jason, Carly, Andrew, Michael, and Sophia. Adored sister of Philip and Kathleen Freud. Devoted psychoanalyst for 35 years. headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  WOTMAN, ANITA FREUD
